successToastDesc: Password reset link has been sent to your email address.
errorToastDesc: An error occurred. Please try again.
errorToastEmailDesc: This email address is not registered in our system.
errorToManyRequestDesc: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
errorServerDesc: We're currently experiencing server issues. Please try again later.
title: Forgot Your Password?
desc: Enter your email address and we'll help you
checkEmailDesc: Don't forget to check your spam folder. The link is valid for 24 hours.
